body_html:
The problem i have with the variable behavior is that you cannot store temporary informations in a variable object in python side. Or you have to make sure that the python object stays in scope.
For example, for better graph printing i was planning on adding a dict property on the python object so that we can easily store arbitrary metadata for a Function.

But i agree that it requires a tight coupling which we might not want.

Changing Function to have same behavior as Variables is a useful, maybe we can delay the question for full persistence of the python object/how to store arbitrary metadata for later?
